loadingAnimation.css: .spinner { width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 5px solid #ccc; border-top-color: #3498db; border-radius: 50%; animation: spin 1s linear infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }

effect.css: .error-message { color: red; font-weight: bold; animation: shake 0.5s; } @keyframes shake { 0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); } 25%, 75% { transform: translateX(-10px); } 50% { transform: translateX(10px); } }
